skillTree.name: Dodgy Geezer
skillTree.description: You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Big 'Ead
skillTree.description: Dat runty shaman finks he's da greatest d'ere is. Give 'em da teef... for now.

skillTree.name: Release Spiders
skillTree.description: The Spider-God's smallest minions spin webs all over the enemy's supplies.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: -4% for missile infantry units

skillTree.name: Howl to the Moon
skillTree.description: Shamans from the Wolf Lands can empower their WAAAGH! with swiftness.

skillTree.name: Vindictive and Cunning
skillTree.description: No one wants to cross a Goblin Shaman.

skillTree.name: Ritual Magics
skillTree.description: Get your hands off that!

skillTree.name: Sneaky Stabbin'
skillTree.description: The targets of this spell are driven to go right for the 'hurty bitz' or sneak up on opponents at unexpected angles.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Sneaky Stabbin'"

ui_effects.description: ➖ Reduces power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 5 projectiles each dealing 500 0 damage and 100 0 explosion damage (2m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Vindictive Glare"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Vindictive Glare Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Vindictive Glare Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Itchy Nuisance"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Gork'll Fix It"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Night Shroud"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Night Shroud Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Night Shroud Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"
Cooldown: -30% to "Curse of Da Bad Moon"
Overcast spell: "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"
Cooldown: -50% to "Curse of Da Bad Moon"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Da Bad Moon"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Curse of Da Bad Moon Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Whispers of Mork
skillTree.description: Oi! I fink I found somethin'.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

skillTree.name: Mini Shrooms
skillTree.description: Pop a shroom, cast a spell. Pop a shroom...

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -5% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -10% for all spells
Winds of Magic cost: -15% for all spells

skillTree.name: Shifty
skillTree.description: I ain't dyin' today.

skillTree.name: Mork's Sabotage
skillTree.description: Mork will sort it.

skillTree.name: Breath of Gork
skillTree.description: What, where'd you fink da wind came from?

effects.description: Reload time reduction: -2% for artillery units
Reload time reduction: -4% for artillery units
Reload time reduction: -6% for artillery units

skillTree.name: Shadow Shaman
skillTree.description: Listen here, yoo's merely adopted the dark; I was born in it, molded by it...

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -1
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -3
Enemy Winds of Magic starting amount: -6

skillTree.name: Onslaught
skillTree.description: With the right amount of preparation, the winds can be harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Hinder Replenishment
skillTree.description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Big Bully
skillTree.description: "Someday he's gonna be a Boss. Can you believe someday we'll work for 'im?"

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -20% for Big 'Uns and Black Orc recruits
Recruit rank: +1 for Big 'Uns and Black Orc units

skillTree.name: Bragga
skillTree.description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.

skillTree.name: Mushroom-Addicted
skillTree.description: "Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Goblin and Night Goblin units

skillTree.name: Serial Danca
skillTree.description: You can't keep a good 'danca' down, especially when those drums start bangin'!

skillTree.name: Tortura
skillTree.description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Knowledgeable
skillTree.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -8

skillTree.name: Intelligent
skillTree.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Shroom Growa’
skillTree.description: Da boyz prefer teef, but enjoy some quality ‘shrooms when the mood strikes.

skillTree.name: Shiny Lova’
skillTree.description: Oi, listen up yooz gits. Bring da shiniest bits back to me… or else.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

skillTree.name: Night Gobbo Loon
skillTree.description: I love da dark places. Yoo can ‘ave so much fun with dem stunties in da dark...

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%

skillTree.name: Bearded Choppas
skillTree.description: It just sorta happened. After a few scraps, da stuntie’s beard-hairs were stickin’ to my choppas.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +25% when fighting against Dwarfs

skillTree.name: Beard Connoisseur
skillTree.description: Whoeva’ brings me da best beard after da scrap gets a necklace o’ teef from my personal stash.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 when fighting against Dwarfs

skillTree.name: Choppa Envy
skillTree.description: "Dere choppa's bigga dan mine."

skillTree.name: Stabba Envy
skillTree.description: "Dat stabba is longa dan mine!"
